results.title: Influence of Musa sapientum L. on pharmacokinetic of metformin in diabetic gastroparesis.
results.text_hl: Influence of Musa sapientum L. on pharmacokinetic of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Gastroparesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018589 @@@diabetic gastroparesis@@@.

citations.NLM: Darvhekar V, Tripathi AS, Jyotishi SG, Mazumder PM, Shelke PG. Influence of Musa sapientum L. on pharmacokinetic of metformin in diabetic gastroparesis. Chin J Integr Med. 2016 Oct;22(10):783-8. PMID: 27460491

results.title: Prevalence of cardiovascular autonomic neuropathy and gastroparesis symptoms among patients with type 2 diabetes who attend a primary health care center
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ users were 4.68 times more likely to exhibit at least one @<m>DISEASE_Gastroparesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018589 @@@gastroparesis symptom@@@ compared with non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users.

citations.NLM: AlOlaiwi LA, AlHarbi TJ, Tourkmani AM. Prevalence of cardiovascular autonomic neuropathy and gastroparesis symptoms among patients with type 2 diabetes who attend a primary health care center PLoS One. 2018;13(12):e0209500. PMID: 30576362
citations.BibTeX: @article{30576362, title={Prevalence of cardiovascular autonomic neuropathy and gastroparesis symptoms among patients with type 2 diabetes who attend a primary health care center}, author={AlOlaiwi LA and AlHarbi TJ and Tourkmani AM}, journal={PLoS One}, volume={13}, number={12}, pages={e0209500}}

results.title: Prevalence of symptoms suggestive of gastroparesis in a cohort of patients with diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The prevalence of symptoms suggestive of @<m>DISEASE_Gastroparesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018589 @@@gastroparesis@@@ among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ in Israel is high and is independently associated with female sex and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Dickman R, Kislov J, Boaz M, Ron Y, Beniashvili Z, Raz I, Baigel I, Niv Y, Wainstein J. Prevalence of symptoms suggestive of gastroparesis in a cohort of patients with diabetes mellitus. J Diabetes Complications. 2013 Jul-Aug;27(4):376-9. PMID: 23507560
